title: Synology Resource Schema
description: Defines a schema for Synology package resources

port-config.description: Install / uninstall service port config file during package install / uninstall.

systemd-user-unit.description: The package framework would copy files at conf/systemd/pkguser-[customname] to home/.config/systemd/user/ on acquired and remove them on released.

usr-local-linker.description: Package's executables and library files should be installed to /usr/local. This worker link / unlink files to /usr/local/{bin,lib,etc} during package start / stop.

bin.description: String array, list of files to be linked under /usr/local/bin/.

etc.description: String array, list of files to be linked under /usr/local/lib/.

lib.description: String array, list of files to be linked under /usr/local/etc/

relpath.description: String, target file's relative path under /var/packages/${package}/target/.
